Zerstorer Marcela:
I like your spirit! Very well, go to the Hills of Gold and slay Green Goblins, Hill Werewolves, Muertos Archers, Mountain Werewolf Chieftains, Muertos Guards and Mountain Fungus. Bring back their claws as proof.
We will pay Adena equal to the number of claws you bring, or you can trade a set of 50 claws for an item.
Good hunting!
